item.title: Who Invented Indian Butter Chicken? (Encore)
item.description: In an episode we first brought you in March, we consider butter chicken. It is a much-loved Indian dish, both within that country and around the world...

item.title: Democratic lawmakers report Thanksgiving bomb threats against their homes
item.description: At least five Democratic members of Congress from Connecticut were targeted by bomb threats on Thursday. Police who responded said they found no evide...

item.title: China sentences veteran journalist on espionage charges
item.description: Longtime state media journalist Dong Yuyu met often with journalists and diplomats. His family believes he is now being persecuted for those exchanges...

item.title: Vito the pug is the first of his breed to win National Dog Show's top prize
item.description: Vito, a pug from Chapel Hill, N.C., beat out more than 1,900 dogs representing more than 200 breeds and varieties that competed in this year's event.
